description:
The queen of Fairyland looks up at the sky with a sad expression. She is worried that collecting Happiness Tones is not going that well. Still, the queen is confident that Lil’Pri is doing their best and smiles. Meanwhile, Ringo, Leila, and Natsuki are busy watching a comedy show on TV. When a commercial with Wish comes on, they lose themselves. Even the Ma-pets who are supposed to watch over them are totally relaxed. That’s when the girl’s wands start glowing. The Ma-pets realize that they have more important business, namely “Making people happy and saving Fairyland!” The Ma-pets are full of passion and tell the girls that they have to undergo training to up their princess powers!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Princess Shuugyou da yo yo Pri!
プリンセス修行だよヨ☆ぷりっ!
